ygData.subject: I may be small....
ygData.msgSnippet: * The invisable ship sat silently for several hours, completly hidden from view from any living thing. A slight wavering in the air disturbed a flock of parots

* The invisable ship sat silently for several hours, completly hidden from 
view from any living thing. A slight wavering in the air disturbed a flock 
of parots that where resting on a branch nearby. The plank that had let the 
monstorous things onto the planet extended again. The erie light once more 
spliied onto the scenery of the lush forest. But this time instead of giant 
monsters coming from the door, a small, littel black fuzz ball with horns 
and bat wings flew out, flying into the night-time sky. Making little 
humming noises that where out of tune...... The plank closed once more, 
returning the forest to it's original form.*
